title: The Third front: political theatre - Erwin Piscator
creator_credit: Arts Council of Great Britain, Margaret Williams and Peter Wyeth
brief_description: Erwin Piscator’s work as a producer/director in the Berlin of the 20’s moved theatre away from the confines of domestic drama to the play of forces in world politics.
